markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swallow-Spike](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1838)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Attacks made by armor with the swallow-spike rune apply the Multiple Attack Penalty as if you had made them with another weapon._

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your armor responds to your desire to break free of a creature grabbing you by growing spikes.

<document level="2" id="action-1530" />

<document level="2" id="action-1531" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Swallow-Spike
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 200 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Swallow-Spike (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The attack modifier increases to +22, the damage increases to 3d6, and the extra damage to an engulfing or swallowing creature increases to 2d6.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 16"
pfs="Standard"
>
Swallow-Spike (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 13 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 19,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The attack modifier increases to +28, the damage increases to 5d6, and the extra damage to an engulfing or swallowing creature increases to 3d6.
name: Swallow-Spike (Major)
